main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a saucer-shaped object in Milledgeville, Georgia on May 3, 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object was described as slightly oval on the top and bottom, made of aluminum and not glowing,Air traffic was present in the area at the time, Observer reported the object moving directly away and then shooting straight up into a cumulus cloud, The investigation concluded with insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: R. ***, age 31, financial management specialist with 27 years of school and three years in the Air Force as a technical school instructor.
